author: admin
title: MarketResearch.com: Ed Tech Startup Dashboard Quarter 3, 2015 Now Available
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/23/2015 @ 4:08 AM   MarketResearch.com 
WASHINGTON and NEW YORK and LONDON, Oct. 23, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- This quarter's Ed Tech Startup Dashboard is now available on MarketResearch.com. The third volume of this report examines the third quarter activity among ed tech startups that are fighting for their spot in this highly competitive market. 
To see the report, visit: http://www.marketresearch.com/land/product.asp?productid=9334268&progid=87946 
Advancements in technology are driving new startups to become involved in the education technology market. Although advancements happen quickly, adoption from schools has been slow due to budget restrictions. 
Even so, use of digital materials in the classrooms is up. However, educators surveyed say they do not fully understand many of the products given to them. Approximately 67% of teachers are not fully satisfied with the effectiveness of the data or tools used in the classroom. Companies will need to develop products that are easier to use, understand, and work with in an educational setting to remain successful in this market. 
Don't miss out on Ed Tech Startup Dashboard Quarter 4, which will publish in January 2016. 
To see all reports by Simba Information, visit: http://www.marketresearch.com/land/publisher.asp?vendorid=3481&progid=87946 
All volumes of Ed Tech Startup Dashboard are available on www.profound.com , where subscribers are able to purchase the individual sections, chapters, tables, or charts of a report they need without having to pay for the pieces they don't.
